mapper.select: SELECT xsi, xai, xbi, xci, xdi, s1, s2, k1, k2, a2, a1, a0, b1, b0, c1, c0, d1, ha2, ha1, hb, hc, u1, u2 FROM temp3.tbl_tank_bsc_inpt_param ttbip JOIN temp3.tbl_dam td ON ttbip.dam_id = td.dam_id WHERE ttbip.DAM_ID=#{DAMID}::UUID AND ttbip.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ttbip.REG_DT DESC LIMIT 1
